include-in-header.text:
<style>
  /* About page specific styling */
  .profile-header {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 2rem;
    margin-bottom: 3rem;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
  }
  .profile-img {
    width: 200px;
    height: 200px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    object-fit: cover;
    border: 4px solid #334155;
  }
  .profile-text {
    flex: 1;
    min-width: 300px;
  }
  .social-links {
    margin: 1.5rem 0;
  }
  .social-links a {
    margin-right: 1rem;
    text-decoration: none;
  }
  .content-section {
    margin-bottom: 3rem;
  }
  .content-section h2 {
    border-bottom: 2px solid #1e3a8a;
    padding-bottom: 0.5rem;
    color: #60a5fa;
    margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
  }
  @media (max-width: 768px) {
    .profile-header {
      flex-direction: column;
      text-align: center;
    }
  }
</style>

![Your Profile Picture](assets/images/profile.jpg){.profile-img}
### Data Analyst | Analytics Professional
[![GitHub](https://img.shields.io/badge/GitHub-181717?logo=github)](https://github.com/yourusername) [![LinkedIn](https://img.shields.io/badge/LinkedIn-0077B5?logo=linkedin)](https://linkedin.com/in/yourprofile) [![Tableau](https://img.shields.io/badge/Tableau-E97627?logo=tableau)](https://public.tableau.com/app/profile/yourprofile) [![Email](https://img.shields.io/badge/Email-D14836?logo=gmail)](mailto:your.email@domain.com)
## Professional Journey {.content-section} [Your professional story here...] *Started my journey in data analytics when...* *Currently focused on...* *Passionate about...* ## Skills & Expertise {.content-section} ### Technical Skills - **Programming**: Python, R, SQL - **Data Visualization**: Tableau, Power BI, Matplotlib, Plotly - **Machine Learning**: Scikit-learn, Predictive Modeling - **Tools**: Git, Docker, AWS, Jupyter Notebooks ### Domain Expertise - Marketing Analytics - Healthcare Analytics - Business Intelligence - Data Storytelling ## Education & Certifications {.content-section} - **Bachelor of Science in Data Science** - University Name (Year) - **Google Data Analytics Professional Certificate** - Google (Year) - **AWS Cloud Practitioner** - Amazon Web Services (Year) ## Currently Learning {.content-section} - Advanced Machine Learning techniques - Cloud data engineering - Real-time analytics platforms --- *"Your favorite data-related quote or personal philosophy"*

![Your Profile Picture](assets/images/profile.jpg){.profile-img}
# Your Name ### Data Analyst | Analytics Professional
[![GitHub](https://img.shields.io/badge/GitHub-181717?logo=github)](https://github.com/yourusername) [![LinkedIn](https://img.shields.io/badge/LinkedIn-0077B5?logo=linkedin)](https://linkedin.com/in/yourprofile) [![Tableau](https://img.shields.io/badge/Tableau-E97627?logo=tableau)](https://public.tableau.com/app/profile/yourprofile) [![Email](https://img.shields.io/badge/Email-D14836?logo=gmail)](mailto:your.email@domain.com)
## Professional Journey {.content-section} [Your professional story here...] *Started my journey in data analytics when...* *Currently focused on...* *Passionate about...* ## Skills & Expertise {.content-section} ### Technical Skills - **Programming**: Python, R, SQL - **Data Visualization**: Tableau, Power BI, Matplotlib, Plotly - **Machine Learning**: Scikit-learn, Predictive Modeling - **Tools**: Git, Docker, AWS, Jupyter Notebooks ### Domain Expertise - Marketing Analytics - Healthcare Analytics - Business Intelligence - Data Storytelling ## Education & Certifications {.content-section} - **Bachelor of Science in Data Science** - University Name (Year) - **Google Data Analytics Professional Certificate** - Google (Year) - **AWS Cloud Practitioner** - Amazon Web Services (Year) ## Currently Learning {.content-section} - Advanced Machine Learning techniques - Cloud data engineering - Real-time analytics platforms --- *"Your favorite data-related quote or personal philosophy"*

<style>
  /* GLOBAL STYLES ONLY - Applied to all pages */
  .navbar-dark {
    background-color: #1e3a8a !important;
  }
  .navbar-dark .navbar-nav .nav-link {
    color: white !important;
  }
  .navbar-dark .navbar-nav .nav-link:hover {
    color: #bfdbfe !important;
  }
  body {
    background-color: #0f172a;
    color: #e2e8f0;
  }
  a {
    color: #60a5fa;
  }
  a:hover {
    color: #93c5fd;
  }
  .nav-pills .nav-link.active {
    background-color: #1e3a8a !important;
    border-color: #1e3a8a !important;
  }
  .nav-pills .nav-link {
    color: #60a5fa !important;
  }
  
  /* Custom Tableau icon styling if needed */
  .fa-chart-bar::before {
    content: "ðŸ“Š";

</style>

  @media (max-width: 768px) {
